thread.title: ICM Promotes Two to Agent in Motion Picture Lit (Exclusive)
thread.title_full: ICM Promotes Two to Agent in Motion Picture Lit (Exclusive)

title: ICM Promotes Two to Agent in Motion Picture Lit (Exclusive)
text:
Sign up for our Newsletters . Daily Edition ICM Promotes Two to Agent in Motion Picture Lit (Exclusive) 3:53 PM PST 2/1/2017 by Rebecca Sun Andrew Murphy (left), Will Watkins Congratulations to Andrew Murphy and Will Watkins. 
ICM Partners has promoted coordinators Andrew Murphy and Will Watkins to agent in the motion picture literary department,   has learned. 
Murphy began his ICM career in 2013 as assistant to Doug MacLaren, who heads the department with Harley Copen. Watkins joined a year later. Both young men were agent trainees before their elevations to coordinator.
